title: @Riot: Concerning Limited Availability Skins
body:
When I check Limited Availability to filter skins, the client rarely shows the ones that are actually available for only a limited amount of days. Can you update this when you temporarily release skins so I know to buy it now before they're taken to the vault? Otherwise just delete this filter option all together. Thank you ^_^

http://4d663a369f9f03c3c61e-870e77779efd63f7bd6c2ee08d8cfae6.r2.cf1.rackcdn.com/images/hO5MzXYxC0xT.878x0.Z-Z96KYq.jpg

replies.body:
Hey Malicious Fury, 

Thanks for pointing this out. We're updating things now, and they should be showing up in the Limited Availability filter shortly. 

The World Championship skins, as well as Championship Kalista, Thresh and Shyvana will be available in the store through November 5th.
Thank you.  This isn't the first time this has happened to me so I thought I'd point it out. ^_^
The store is sometimes super picky with tags, and since these skins are out for longer than most limited availability skins, it didn't pick them up!

Here's an idea you can pass along to whomever is in charge of it. Have underneath those skins "Available until xx - xx - xxxx" in the portrait.   I know there is usually a separate page in the News section that tells us, but having an in-client option would let me know to hurry up and buy it this week or next.  Again, thank you for your time.
Thanks for the feedback! I'd be happy to pass it on. ^-^
it seems to work for me, it still has the "champions owned" filter on probable as well and you may or may not have them all, and it doesnt show owned skins
Going through all filters, with Limited Availability checked, the only Limited Availibility Champion skin that ever pops up is Jaximus.
